\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 79040}

\subsection*{Like Cold Lemonade}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Chainsaw}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &  repeated &  & Products - Spice and Synthetic Cannabinoids & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 200.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
My expierence with Icey XXX and other spice products has changed my life in such a positive way I feel like I don't know what I ever did without it. This relaxing substance has become my exscape from a very stressful life. I work a very fast faced job that is very taxing on my body. The overwelming joy that this little bag brings me undescribable. I have been useing this substance in very small amounts for about a year now and after all the research and all this time I am convinced it is a miracle. I am a lawful person. I do not break the law and never will. The effects of certain brands I use to plan my activities. If I have somthing important to do I use a shorter acting spice like Smoke or Bonsaid Blend. But if I want a stronger longer lasting product I use ICEY XXX or Spice Diamond. It does not seem addictive, and it doesn't really bother me if I run out for a couple weeks. It's like cold lemonade on a hot summer day.
